body: You have all gotten that one stinky gift that either your aunt or a friend gives to you that is just a disgust to your other presents. Let me know what yours was this years and maybe what's the worst gift you have ever gotten! Mine would probably be a shirt :/.

Got a broken pair of $15 earphones from a friend of mine this Christmas. Ahh, at least she tried. :P

replies.body:
Sorry for the off-topic, but this post is a little bit useless.
This is my Prespective about this post:
1st - If someone give you a present, it's already good. So there ain't bad presents, only presents that we prefer more then anothers.
2nd - Christmas is not about the presents, Christmas is about familly, Jesus, and having fun all together while having dinner and stuff like that. 
It's a bit sad to say this, but If I ask anyone what does Christmas reminds you / something good in Christmas I will get this type of awsers:
I love it because we receive presents. It's a bit selfish don't u agree? Why selfish? 25th December is when Jesus ''borned'', it's HIS day, not our day. Thanks and good Christmas everyone.
replies.body_tagged:
